title: I am no longer able to swipe in any direction on my pixel 3a. How do I fix this?
content:
Instead of being able to swipe from screen to screen, a green box appears and I have to try to get the green box around the correct area and double tap to try to open anything.
I tried restarting my phone but that didn't help.
After several minutes of struggling, I was able to get the settings open, but I can't swipe the list of options up and down to see if I could change anything there.
What do I do?  I would like to be able to use the various apps on my phone but I can't swipe over to access them.
